experience: You and Chris both know Dan Nienhauser, Isaac Blake, and 93 others
You and Chris are both in the Arizona Medical Device Network group

Indecomm Global Services is a leading global provider of consulting, outsourcing, learning, and technology services. With operations spanning six countries across four continents, we leverage our practical and relevant technology platforms, process excellence, deep domain expertise, and strategic enterprise partnerships to deliver superior business results for our clients.Indecomm was founded in 2003 as a technology-enabled services company focused on high-speed document imaging technologies and automated data capture from structured and unstructured forms, with an innate ability to apply these technologies meaningfully to improve operational efficiency and client experience. Over the years, we have expanded these technology platforms to handle complex business processes across a wide range of industry domains like mortgage, healthcare, banking, and retail.With a talent pool of over 3,500 associates across a global footprint of 21 locations (delivery centers, development labs, and offices), we provide comprehensive consulting, outsourcing, learning, and technology solutions across various business verticals. We have active business engagements with over 300 global clients, including 20+ Fortune 500 companies.The ability to work proactively with our clients across a wide range of services has helped us deliver unsurpassed value to our clients. The catchphrase, "Partnerships@work," embodies the culture and the spirit that we endeavor to capture in every single engagement and interaction with our clients.

At Cimphoni, we help companies realize the potential of their technology investments. This is done using experienced leaders who have delivered results in both business and IT operating roles. Cimphoni consultants take a hands-on approach, working directly with IT and business leaders to address their most pressing challenges and opportunities.

Working with the leading technology vendors, Artha Solutions provides business, technology, strategy consulting and implementations with experience and expertise in finance, insurance, retail, media, utilities and healthcare domains, Artha has developed solutions to accelerate business transformation process and created a proven methodology for projects of all types and sizes.Artha understand that each project is unique and different bringing its own challenges. With a proven track record, Artha Solutions has completed projects that include: strategy to implementation, value chain analysis; business intelligence / analytics, embedded analytics, data management / big data; web-service / SOA; real-time application integration, mediation; messaging; data governance; and business process management.

NetVision Resources has over 15 years of proven expertise in Information Technology, Engineering, Consulting Services, and Personnel Management. One of our primary specialties centers around Mobile Technology. Responsible for managing the organizations sales and talent acquisition efforts. Our clients include National Institute of Standards and Technology, Social Security Administration, Department of Veterans Affairs, Food and Drug Administration, State of Maryland - DHMH, General Dynamics, Talend, US Airways, AAA Insurance and APA amongst others. NVR has strong partnerships with large System Integrators including Northrop Grumman Corporation, Computer Science Corporation, SRA International, Booz Allen Hammilton and IBM. NVR specializes in providing cutting edge solutions in the Health IT arena, focused on Mobile Technology, Content Management Solutions, Cloud Deployment and Big Data / Predictive Analytics. Specialties: Mobile Technology, Content Management Solutions, Cloud Deployment and Big Data.

Intertec International was founded in 2002 with corporate headquarters in Phoenix, Arizona. There are now two additional solution delivery offices in San Jose, Costa Rica and London, UK. Intertec has expanded around the globe doing business in more than 10 countries. With its global focus, Intertec Consulting is able to provide valuable and reliable solutions and alternatives to its customers. We emphasize trust, service, and partnership in all areas of our business and believe that our capabilities provide key contributions to our client’s ability to improve quality, scale and speed.As an important part of the company’s strategy, Intertec has established two main delivery centers of excellence in San Jose, Costa Rica (under the name of Micra Consulting) which are today the company’s near shore capabilities offices. For more information on Micra Consulting and the advantages in choosing to do business in Costa Rica.

CDI is a professional services company that offers Fortune 1000 clients a cost-effective, single-source provider of high-value engineering, IT and professional staffing solutions. With more than 50 years in the industry and annual revenues in excess of $1 billion, CDI has the expertise, speed and scale to help clients achieve a faster and higher return on capital investment.CDI Business Solutions group offers tailored business solutions to the following markets:- Aerospace - Government Services - IT Services- IT Outsourcing - Life Sciences - Process & Industrial In addition, CDI offers specialized business solutions through its subsidiaries: CDI AndersElite Limited, in the United Kingdom; Management Recruiters International, Inc. (MRI), one of the world’s largest executive search and recruitment organizations and Todays Staffing, Inc., which provides temporary and permanent placement services for the administrative, legal and financial staffing markets.

September 4, 2009, Ron worked with Chris in the same group

Ron is one of the most dynamic and enthusiastic managers I have ever worked with. Initially, he will spend time “getting to know” his employees/team members and the areas they work within. Once he has sized up his resources and understands what kind of projects and objectives are ensuing, he puts together a plan to achieve goals. That plan not only addresses how the employer will gain efficiencies and greater profits, but it also addresses how the employees will grow intellectually and career-wise. His dynamic nature quickly achieves buy-in from his employees. His understood philosophy was that success would be a team effort, resulting in a team reward. This teamwork approach is the central focus of and blueprint for achieving his goals. Ron is an excellent mentor and a very open person with great personality. People with different cultures and backgrounds all like to work with him. This is largely attributed in his unique approach in motivating, training, and helping them become successful.  Ron is one of those “rare” people you get to work with in a lifetime that leaves an indelible mark on you, such as who you are as a person and how to approach any situation you may encounter whether it is life or work related.  I truly valued my time with Ron and would welcome the opportunity to work with him in the future.
